entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 8:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %

Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
